title: MD
biography: Lê Thanh Hải served as Secretary of the Ho Chi Minh City Party Committee from 2005 to 2015. Lê Thanh Hải was a member of the 11th Politburo, in which he is ranked 6th.
aiSummary: Le Thanh Hai is a pediatrics specialist with an H-index of 31 at National Children’s Hospital Hanoi (Member). Has been published in Chemical Engineering Science, The Lancet Rheumatology, The Lancet. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
